  2. 178-182/365: Last week

  3. 177/365: Patience

    05.07.2011

    It's a good job I had a free afternoon.

  4. 176/365: Fresh Air 2011

    05.07.2011

    Thanks to one of my Flickr contacts I was made aware of Fresh Air 2011, a sculpture exhibition held in a tiny village in the Cotswolds. I wasn't going to go, feeling disillusioned with my photos and all, but I'm glad I did in the end.

    Today was mostly about reflections, it seems.

  5. Old holiday snaps: Kenya

    04.07.2011

    Some photos from our trip to Kenya in Autumn 2009. Can't remember which ones were taken by me and which are Steph's, so I'll take credit for them all.

    These were taken with our old Canon Powershot, probably on Auto mode, before I knew anything about cameras and stuff. Despite that, I'm quite pleased with some of the results.
